name: Rupam Islam
description:
'''Rupam Islam''' (born 25 January 1974) is an Indian singer-songwriter, music composer, and writer. He is the lead vocalist of the [[Rock music of West Bengal|Bengali rock]] band [[Fossils (band)|Fossils]]. Outside of his rock music work, Islam also contributes to several [[Cinema of West Bengal|Bengali film]] productions as a [[playback singer]].

In 2010, he won the [[National Film Award for Best Male Playback Singer]] for his performance in the Bengali film, [[Mahanagar@Kolkata]]. He is also a member of the Bangla Sangeet Akademi, an institution under the [[Government of West Bengal]].
